Summary: Dark triangle travelling from North to South. Low noise steady path at about twice the speed of normal plane.3 dim lights at corners.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around November 19th 2013
divs: sighting detailsawpke from sleeping about 1:30am. went downstairs to get a drink of water. sometimes i will look out the window at the stars. around 2:10am i noticed a dim set of unblinking\unchanging lights coming from the north and heading due south. as the craft approached i noticed it was triangular in shape and heard a low humming noise. it was travelling about twice the speed of an airplane at a low altitude. definitely not a plane or shooting star. noticeable shape and dark grey\black in colour. the craft passed out of view from the window and was gone.
